nodes.text: Charmer's squad was a unit led by Sergeant Pol Andrissus, known as Charmer, in the Alliance to Restore the Republic's 61st Mobile Infantry shortly after the attack on Haidoral Prime, where he was formally part of Hazram Namir's squad. During a raid on an Imperial heavy freighter, the squad was attacking guard posts. When the squads evacuated, Charmer reported his squad's departure with one minute to spare, to Namir's delight. Sometime later, the Sixty-First was fighting on Mardona III. During the fight, Charmer's squad was attack by an armored worm vehicle. Charmer sacrificed himself for the squad but only Corbo made it out.
Pol Andrissus's squad first appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
